name: 13th International Microsystems, Packaging, Assembly and Circuits Technology Conference
content: 【Date】Oct 24 (Wed)-26(Fri), 2018 【Venue】Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center 【Theme】IMPACT on Artificial Intelligence - Our Future 【Exhibition】TPCA Show 2018 【On-line Submission】 www.impact.org.tw IMPACT 2018 Conference is a widely-recognized international conference of the IEEE EPS-Taipei Society, held annually in Taipei in October. The conference is organized by, iMAPS-Taiwan, ITRI and TPCA, is the largest gathering of packaging and PCB professionals in Taiwan. This year will be held in conjunction with TPCA SHOW 2018 from Oct. 24th to Oct. 26th at Taipei Nangang Exhibition Center. The symposium highlights the theme “IMPACT on Artificial Intelligence - Our Future” toward intelligent innovations.
